title: Scripture Index
content: The first column designates the scripture reference; the second column identifies the reading block where this reference is found.
analysis. The scripture referred to is the subject of a whole section or chapter.
commentary. A short, explanatory comment is made about the scripture.
meaning. The meaning of a word or phrase in the scripture is discussed.
quotation. The scripture is quoted partially or in full.
reference. The scripture is merely referred to.
The Joseph Smith Translation is used.
